timeline.bodyText:
May be one more test for using non-params (like columns outside) and also the function name case insensitively like:
SELECT array_APPEND(Array, iTem) from (SELECT array[1] array, 2 ITEM)
timeline.author: kaikalur

timeline.message:
Treat SQL function parameter case-insensitive

Function parameters should be case-insensitive.
Also fixing:
* Store the parameter names as originally provided by users
* Use identifier default setting for delimited

timeline.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: I copied from the other function. 😂
